name: Our House--A Caltrop Core Game of Spooky Ghosts
name_original: Our House--A Caltrop Core Game of Spooky Ghosts
description:
Life was good when it was just you and your fellow ghosts living in your haunted house--but now those infernal living people have decided to move in and spoil all your fun! Enter "Our House--A Caltrop Core Game of Spooky Ghosts" and get those living folk out of here! 

"Our House" is a short TTRPG where being spooky is your goal! Choose your ghost type and your special ability, and then scare those living people out of your home! Get ready for some spooky fun!*

*should be played in a dark room lit only by candles for maximum spookiness.
